post:
Hello,

The VPS specs are:

**NEW! KVM NAT Storage US**

<pre>
1 vCPU core Xeon L5520
Unlimited CPU core 2.27GHz
2GB RAM
500GB HDD RAID-5
Linux/Windows OS
Bandwidth 250Mbit
Traffic 2TB
1 IPv4 NAT
DDoS protection
Location - Las Vegas
Price - $4.99/mo (or $11.99/quarter)
Link - https://www.wishosting.com/order/config/index/VPS/?group_id=2&pricing_id=50
</pre>

You can order several packages of the same type and combine them into one VM. Also you can request a private networking between your VMs.

The payment gateway is Bitpay (Bitcoin) or 2Checkout (PayPal), it is also possible to pay via Skrill manually, just open a ticket.

https://www.wishosting.com
